Example: The manager told a joke, but no one laughed
ExampleTranslation: 经理讲了一个笑话,不过却没有人笑

Word: be as happy as a clam
Example: I was as happy as a clam when we won the game
ExampleTranslation: 我们赢得比赛时,我乐翻天了

Example: It thrills me to know that my girlfriend is coming to see me tonight.
ExampleTranslation: 得知我女友今晚要来看我时,我兴奋不已

Example: The magic show excited all the children
ExampleTranslation: 这场魔术表演使所有的小朋友好兴奋

Example: I find comfort in listening to music whenever I feel upset
ExampleTranslation: 每当我心烦时就会在听音乐中找到慰籍

WordTranslation: 使高兴(及物动词);振奋起来(不及物动词）
Example: We all tried to cheer Mary up, but she still felt very down
ExampleTranslation: 我们都在试图激励玛丽,可她仍然很失落

Example: Ladies and gentlemen, I take delight in giving this speech to you this evening
ExampleTranslation: 诸位女土先生,今晚很高兴能向大家发表演讲

Example: I find this story very interesting
ExampleTranslation: 我发现这个故事很有趣

Example: I'm not satisfied with my new hairstyle
ExampleTranslation: 我不满意这个新发型

Example: Joe's violin playing skills amazed everyone at the concert
ExampleTranslation: 乔的小提琴演奏技巧计演秦会上的所有人大为惊艳

Example: Tim was fascinated by the girl's sweet volce on the phone
ExampleTranslation: 蒂姆对电话中女该的甜美声音深深着迷

Example: Oh, there she isl" Jane exclaimed when she saw her long lost friend
ExampleTranslation: “噢,她在那儿！”简看到失散多年的朋友时,她惊叫出声

Example: Mr. Como's offer took me by surprise.
ExampleTranslation: 柯摩先生的提议使我很惊讶

Example: Polly grieved her dog's death, but there was nothing she could do about it
ExampleTranslation: 波莉为狗儿的死去感到悲伤,但无能为力

Example: I don't like the mournful music the store plays
ExampleTranslation: 我不喜欢这间商店播放的优伤的音乐

Example: What you said truly broke my heart.
ExampleTranslation: 你的话真的伤了我的心

Example: Kelly burst out arying when David broke up with her = Kelly burst into tears when David broke up with her
ExampleTranslation: 戴维跟她分手时,凯莉突然大哭起来

Example: It disheartens me that everything in my hometown has changed
ExampleTranslation: 故乡人事已非使我感到气馁

Example: Carl tried to discourage his daughter from datngboys
ExampleTranslation: 卡尔试图打消他女儿想和男孩子约会的念头

Example: The product dissatisfies me; I want to return it
ExampleTranslation: 这件商品我很不满意;我想要退货

Example: John was disappointed with his grades
ExampleTranslation: 约翰对他的成绩失望了

Example: Please don' t let me down
ExampleTranslation: 请别让我失望

Example: To my regret, I didn't have money with me when I saw the coat at half price
ExampleTranslation: 令我遗憾的是,大衣半价但我却没带钱

Example: The noise from my neighbor's TV annoys me
ExampleTranslation: 邻居家电视的嘈杂声令我恼怒

Example: Don't bother about what Sam told you
ExampleTranslation: 别因为山姆跟你说的话而烦心

Example: Carol took offense at my comments about her
ExampleTranslation: 我对卡萝所做的评语令她很不悦

WordTranslation: (气到撞上天花板,比喻)非常生气
Example: Mom hit the ceiling when she found out I broke her vase
ExampleTranslation: 老妈发现我打破她的花瓶时非常生气

Example: Helena was overwhelmed with anger when she heard the news
ExampleTranslation: 海伦娜听到这个消息时她气到难以承受

Word: get/ be hot under the collar
Example: Sophia got hot under the collar when her brother broke her doll
ExampleTranslation: 苏菲亚的哥哥弄坏她的洋娃娃时,她气得脸红脖子粗

Example: Don' t disturb Dad while he is at work
ExampleTranslation: 老爸工作时不要打扰他

Example: James let out a yell of frustration and then walked out of?the roorn
ExampleTranslation: 詹斯丧地大吼一声后走到了房外

Example: People were outraged by the now policy
ExampleTranslation: 民众对于新政策感到愤怒

Example: John's rude attitude really pisses me off.
ExampleTranslation: 约翰无理的态度直的让我很生气

Example: The noise Brad made when eating irritated me
ExampleTranslation: 布菜德吃饭的声音激怒了我

Example: Sam tried to provoke Rick into a fight
ExampleTranslation: 山姆试着激怒瑞克来引发争执

WordTranslation: vt.怨恨(后接名词或动名词作宾语）
Example: John resents getting up early=John hates getting up early= John hates to get up early
ExampleTranslation: 约翰厌恶早起

WordTranslation: vt.使人厌恶,使人恶心&n厌恶
Example: Your evil behavior disgusts me
ExampleTranslation: 你邪恶的行为使我感到恶心

Example: Jim was tired of his job, so he quit
ExampleTranslation: 吉姆厌倦了他的工作,因此就辞职了

Example: I'm fed up with all the gossip about me
ExampleTranslation: 我受够了所有关于我的八卦话题

Example: I'm afraid to talk to the school principal
ExampleTranslation: 我很怕跟校长说话

Example: tremble with fear
ExampleTranslation: 害怕得直发抖

Example: Dennis shivered with cold while waiting for the bus in the snow
ExampleTranslation: 丹尼斯在雪里等公交车时冷得发抖

Example: Nick's bottom lip quivered with fear.
ExampleTranslation: 尼克的下嘴唇因为恐惧而颤抖着

Example: When Tom saw the horrible sight, a shudder swept over him
ExampleTranslation: 汤姆看到这个恐怖的景象,他全身一震

Example: Samantha never drives for fear of an accident
ExampleTranslation: 萨曼莎因害怕意外而从不开车

Example: The boy sat in fear during the earthquake
ExampleTranslation: 地震时这个男孩子忧心地坐着

Example: The horror movie terrified the children
ExampleTranslation: 这部恐怖电影吓坏了孩子们

Example: The strange voice coming from the well gave me the creeps
ExampleTranslation: 从井里传来的怪声让我毛骨悚然

Word: break out in a cold sweat
Example: I broke out in a cold sweat just thinking about the speech contest
ExampleTranslation: 想到这场演讲比赛我就紧张得直冒冷汗

Example: Many college students are anxious about their future
ExampleTranslation: 许多大学生对前途感到焦虑不安

Example: The witch's horrible voice startled me
ExampleTranslation: 女巫可怕的声音吓了我一大跳

Example: The news that Peter would leave our school came as a shock.
ExampleTranslation: 彼得要离开我们学校,这突如其来的消息令人震惊

Example: Mary saw the sign and got confused
ExampleTranslation: 玛丽看到这标识就搞不清楚了

Example: This question has perplexed me for a week.
ExampleTranslation: 这个问题让我困惑一周了

Example: I got mixed up about who was to be invited to the party
ExampleTranslation: 我已经搞混究竟该请谁来参加聚会

Example: Mary's comments hurt David's pride
ExampleTranslation: 玛丽的评语伤了戴维的自尊心

Example: The man looked at the child with scorn
ExampleTranslation: 这个男人用不屑的态度看着这孩子

Example: Tim despises everyone around him
ExampleTranslation: 蒂姆鄙视身边所有的人

Example: Many experts are skeptical about the professor's findings
ExampleTranslation: 许多专家对这位教授的研究结果表示质疑

Example: The rich tend to look down on the poor.
ExampleTranslation: 富人容易瞧不起穷人

Example: I got angry when I found out John was teasing me
ExampleTranslation: 我发现约翰在揶揄我时,我生气了

Example: The kids mocked Freddy because of the clothes he wore
ExampleTranslation: 这些孩子嘲笑佛莱迪的穿着

Example: I always remember the people who have laughed at me
ExampleTranslation: 我永远记得那些嘲笑过我的人

Example: Your question is an insult to my intelligence
ExampleTranslation: 你的问题对我的智力是种侮辱

Example: Peter's new cell phone is the envy of everyone in the office
ExampleTranslation: 彼得的新手机羡煞办公室内所有人

Example: The woman was jealous of Joanne's happy marriage
ExampleTranslation: 这女人嫉妒乔安的幸福婚姻
